customize.name: From Dusk to Dawn in Byakuyakoku

customize.name: The Entrance to Tokoyo
customize.desc: After passing through The Moon-Bathed Deep, you come to a land that is foreign to you. You see no sign of any civilization at all, and so you decide to investigate further.

customize.name: Reins of Revival
customize.desc: The hereditary national treasure of Byakuyakoku. Apart from representing the highest authority in the land, it also confers the ability to control souls and this realm.

customize.name: Reins of Revival Fragment (Serpent's Heart)
customize.desc: A fragment of the Reins of Revival. The three fragments, too, follow "The Rule of Three."

customize.text:
<color=#ece5d8>Enkanomiya, Inazuma</color>
<color=#ffffff>Quest Description:</color> <color=#ffffff>You decide to head to Serpent's Heart to search for the fragment of the Reins of Revival</color>
Quest Objective: Go to the Serpent's Heart

<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> This... strange feeling in the air. Is this what Aru called a Sunfire Phantasm?
<color=#ffffff>Paimon:</color> Let's go closer and have a look. Maybe there's some way to switch this place to Evernight

Quest Objective: Obtain the fragment of the Reins of Revival
